channel.title: Abyss
channel.description:
[B][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yI8FPO9.png[/img]
My server is not online for money. I have ran multiple servers, and I have scammed people for money, I have duped on servers, sold items for a quick buck on my own server. However, I'm not the same person that I was two years ago. I have solved all my person quarries with everyone in my past and I have really enjoyed that transformation. My server is online because of the learning experience it provides for me and it gives people the chance to be part of a family. We have people who are alone, socially unaccepted, sad, happy, people who like sports, nerds, people who hack others for a living, people who work for charity, etc.. Anyone, no matter what their background or past may involve, can enjoy something at the end of the day. Something special. That is what Abyss is.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o3r8T0B.png[/img] - [URL=http://"http://abyss-rs.com/forums/forum.php"]Forums[/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6WjEvpH.png[/img] - [URL=http://"http://abyss-rs.com/client.jar"]Download Client[/URL] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6WjEvpH.png[/img] - [URL=http://"http://abyss-rs.com/webclient.html"]Web-Client[/URL]
Credits: Forums System: vBulletin 4.2.2 Additional Credits: NFO/FiveRiverFlo/Mikey'/Alexander
Features:
[ul][*]20+ Multi/Single Boss's for you to fight! [*]23+ Skills FULLY WORKING(dung+summoning fully working, Construction will be added soon) [*]Fully working Slayer System with Slayer shop and Working Ring of Wealth [*]Fully working Dung with chaotic's/Arcane Stream's/Etc [*]100% WORKING DUEL ARENA(dupe/bug free) [*]Fully Working Pest control(void/torso/Fighter hat etc) [*]Fully Working Warrior's Guide(With working Tokens/Defender drops!) [*]Working Fight Pits for Server events/rewards. [*]Working Jad(with full waves, For Firecape/Kiln cape) [*]3 Fully working Quests for you to complete to earn quest points/in-game rewards. [*]Portals at home for Safepk/Clan wars(gives the ability to gear quickly and get back to clan wars fast). [*]Amazing Voting Shop with Dragon masks,Easter ring,Ardy cloak, And dragon pets + MUCH MORE [*]Working Lottery System [*]WORKING PLAYER OWNED SHOPS(VERY RARE ON A 317) [*]Fully Working Achievement System(with different tiers!) [*]FULL Comp Cape/Max cape, These capes are actually HARD and are quite an achievement! [*]FULL Highscores [*]Crystal Key Chest(with randomized rewards). [*]Skill Reseter in case you want to change your level's to pk. [*]100% working curses(leech's,Soulsplit,Wrath,Turmoil,EVERTHING WORKS). [*]A REAL economy server, Not a server you get a 99 every hour and are maxed in a day, xp rates are slow enough to make 99's worth something but fast enough to keep you interested![/ul]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eKpcbET.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JqI77D6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oOxr5ub.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mYZNRYJ.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dhrg4J0.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SnD0gyU.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0s3lfIG.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VzohuMq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/plvlwST.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mMVdNXJ.png[/img]
[IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3359084151.png[/img]
Development Team: Hank- Abyss Founder/Source Developer/Website Developer Karan - Source Developer Senne - Source Developer Lennard - Source Developer
Support Signature: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/u5ky9bD.png[/img]
[/CENTER][/B]

item.title: Abyss
item.dc:creator: @birdhouse919 birdhouse919
item.description:
@birdhouse919 wrote:

Learning Code:

Looks nice, I see Mikey’ Sold more copies of Endeavor than I thought. GL on project. I may Pop in.

Yes, he did.

I was the co-owner of Endeavor for well over 8 months, so most of the players followed me. lol

Read full topic
